TopicTitle: Is there a way to set FPS limit?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to play but because the there's no FPS limit my GPU runs really hot trying to render 120 FPS
You may be able to set it in your GPU control panel (NVIDIA Control Panel or whatever the AMD equivalent is).

The AMD app can do it, it's listed as radeon chill. And depending on card features, upscaling, downscaling, aliasing. A bunch of stuff to try and lessen the workload. I'm sure the NV app has equivents.
